Homepage.title: Find your dream home in Poland
Homepage.subtitle: Discover housing projects
Homepage.Description: With numerous real estate project listings, find the property that suits you using search filters for apartments and building services.

Filtre.Ajouter: Sign up to list your project

Projet.DesSEOExplication: The SEO description is used as a meta description for SEO. It helps Google and other search engines understand the content of your project and rank it better.
Projet.IASEODescription: Click the button to generate an SEO-optimized description for this project.

SEO.Title: Real estate project directory
SEO.Description: Find a real estate project that suits you using search filters for apartments and building services.
SEO.Description1: We focus on SEO to ensure good ranking of your page in search engines
SEO.Description2: The AI tool will help you write your project description, manage meta description and title
SEO.SearchPlaceholder: Search for a new apartment in...

ProjectSection.Description:
The developer provides here general information about the real estate project, such as location, currency, presentation link, and amenities offered in the residence.

This data allows for a clear and comprehensive presentation of the project to potential buyers. The more precise and detailed the information, the easier it is for potential buyers to imagine and appreciate the quality of the project.

Don't hesitate to indicate all features that add value to your project: equipment, services, environment, accessibility, etc. A precise and well-presented description increases the visibility and attractiveness of your project on the platform.
ProjectSection.Title: Project information

ManageSection.title: Add Projects/Collaborators
ManageSection.description: As a developer, you can add projects and collaborators to your workspace. You can precisely define permissions for each collaborator, specifying which projects they can modify. This detailed access control allows you to maintain full control over your projects while facilitating collaboration with your team.

MagicLink.MagicLink_Description: Magic Link allows you to log in easily and securely without having to remember a password. Simply click on the link received by email to access your account. Each link is unique, can only be used once, and expires quickly to ensure account security. If needed, you can request a new Magic Link at any time and generate one for each device you want to log in from.

ProjectCard_Description: Each Hoomge project card contains a direct link to your website and to the developer's project page.

FAQ.FAQ_UpdateProject: How can I update my project information on Hoomge?
FAQ.FAQ_UpdateProject_Answer: You can edit your project information at any time from your personal space. Go to the corresponding project card and click 'Edit' to update details, add photos, or correct information.
FAQ.FAQ_ContactPromoteur: How can visitors contact the project developer?
FAQ.FAQ_ContactPromoteur_Answer: Each Hoomge project card displays the developer's contact information and a direct link to their website. Visitors can easily get more information or contact the developer directly.
FAQ.FAQ_MagicLink_Answer: Magic Link allows you to log in easily and securely without having to remember a password. Simply click on the link received by email to access your account. Each link is unique, can only be used once, and expires quickly to ensure account security. If needed, you can request a new Magic Link at any time and generate one for each device you want to log in from.
FAQ.FAQ_Collaborateurs_Answer: Like the developer, collaborators log in using Magic Link and the email you added to the list. You don't need to manage passwords for your collaborators.
FAQ.FAQ_Abonnement: Can I switch from one subscription to another?
FAQ.FAQ_Abonnement_Answer: Yes, you can switch from one subscription to another by simply changing the subscription in your account. You can switch between mini/medium/large subscriptions according to your needs. You can also change the project after it's completed and start a new one without changing the subscription.
FAQ.FAQ_Pourcentage: Does Hoomge take a percentage of sales?
FAQ.FAQ_Pourcentage_Answer: No, Hoomge does not take a percentage of sales. Hoomge's goal is to promote your projects and help find buyers. Each Hoomge project card displays the developer's contact information and a direct link to their website. Visitors can easily get more information or contact the developer directly.

SubscribeButton.title: Subscription
SubscribeButton.description: To publish your real estate projects on our platform, start by creating a developer account by choosing the plan that suits your needs...

contact.title: Need more than 10 projects or additional users?
contact.link: Contact us for a custom offer

step1.title: Sign in with Magic Link
step1.description: Enter your email address and click 'Magic Link'. You will immediately receive an email with a unique secure link.

step2.title: You receive an email with a unique secure link
step2.description: Check your inbox. Click the unique link you received to securely access your personal space, without any password to remember.

step3.title: You are logged into your account
step3.description: You are now logged into your account. Enjoy all the features of the platform with ease and security!

Navbar.invitation_sent: Invitation sent! The collaborator will receive an email with an access link. Their account will be created when they click this link for the first time.

IAComponents.seoShortDescription: Generate an optimized short description for SEO (meta-description). Use keywords relevant to your project for better results. The description should be concise and appealing.
IAComponents.keywordsAdvantagesPlaceholder: e.g., sea view, near city center, luxury finish
IAComponents.keywordsAdvantagesHelp: Separate keywords or advantages with commas. This will help the AI generate a more relevant description.

Promoteur.autoTranslationInfo: Items added by promoters are automatically translated to make apartment searches easier for international users.
Promoteur.autoTranslationInfoLong:
To make apartment searches easier for users around the world, all items added by promoters (titles, descriptions, amenities, etc.) are automatically translated into multiple languages.
This feature ensures that every project is visible and understandable to an international audience, especially in search engines, without any extra effort from promoters.
It is also a valuable asset for attracting potential investors internationally.

chatbot.title: AI Assistant
chatbot.subtitle: Ask your questions about the webapp
chatbot.welcome: Hello! ðŸ‘‹ I am the AI assistant of this site. Ask me your questions about how it works, bugs, suggestions, or improvements to our webapp. I only answer questions about this site.
chatbot.emailExplain: Providing your email allows us to validate that we can record this conversation to improve the service and better take your suggestions into account. It will never be used for commercial purposes.

PromoteurSlogan: Hoomge: the platform to promote your real estate projects
PromoteurSubtitle: Reach an international audience with automatic translation
